dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3951302L] [Fwd: [ADMINS] DMCA take-down notice regarding unauthorise

MIME element (text/plain) 
For discussion of this matter you may contact me at this email address
or by  
phone at +61-4106-54689. 
 
The site linuxresource.lemonup.com (IP address 70.87.170.2 managed by  
hostgator and/or theplanet) seems to only contain content copied  
without permission from my blogs (which are at http://etbe.blogspot.com/
and  
http://etbe.coker.com.au/ ). 
 
My blog license is described at  
http://etbe.blogspot.com/2007/04/lemonup-and-blog-license.html 
 
 
http://linuxresource.lemonup.com/ 
http://linuxresource.lemonup.com/feed/ 
http://linuxresource.lemonup.com/DMCA-etc/ 
http://linuxresource.lemonup.com/school-rating/ 
 
As of this moment the above URLs only contain content of which I own the

copyright and have not given lemonup permission to use. 
 
Under penalty of perjury I claim sole copyright ownership of all
intellectual  
property on the URLs http://etbe.blogspot.com/ and
http://etbe.coker.com.au/  
apart from any sections expressly marked as quoting others.  I do not
grant  
lemonup.com permission to use it for any commercial purpose (they are  
currently using it to make money through advertising). 
 
http://linuxresource.lemonup.com/ 
 
Also lemonup commit slander of title by claiming copyright of my
original  
content on the above URL. 
 
My first DMCA take-down request was on the 25th of April (and was
acknowledged  
on the same day by a representative of lemonup.com).  It seems that the

operator of lemonup.com is not responsive to DMCA requests and the  
responsibility for removing the pirate content falls on you. 
 
 
PS  I expect responses from both theplanet and hostgator.  If you
believe that  
your company is not responsible for the IP address 70.87.170.2 then
please  
let me know. 
 
--  
russell@coker.com.au 
http://etbe.coker.com.au/          My Blog 
 
http://www.coker.com.au/sponsorship.html Sponsoring Free Software
development 
 
 
MIME element (text/plain)
